title: Poova Eduthu Oru Maala Lyrics Amman Kovil Kizhakale
stanzas: <div>Poova Eduthu Oru Maala Lyrics Amman Kovil Kizhakale

Poova eduthu oru
maala thoduthu vachcheney
en chinna rasa. (2)

un tholukkaagathaan
indha maala yaengudhu.
kalyaanam kachcheri
eppodhu.

Poova eduthu oru
maala thoduthu vachcheney
en chinna rasa. (2)

un tholukkaagathaan
indha maala yaengudhu.
kalyaanam kachcheri
eppodhu.

Poova eduthu oru
maala thoduthu vachcheney
en chinna rasa. (2)

kaathula soodam pola
karaiyiren unnaala. (2)
kannaadi vala
munnaadi vizha
en dhegam melinjaachu

kalyaana varam
unnaala perum
nannaala nenachaachu.

chinna vayasu pulla
kanni manasukulla
vanna kanavu vandhathe.

kalyaanam kachcheri
eppodhu, unakku. ..

Poova eduthu oru
maala thoduthu vachcheney
en chinna rasa. (2)

un tholukkaagathaan
indha maala yaengudhu.
kalyaanam kachcheri
eppodhu.

Poova eduthu oru
maala thoduthu vachcheney
en chinna rasa.

vaadaiyaa veesum kaathu
valaikkudhe ena paathu
vaangalen neram paaththu
vandhu enna kaappaathu.

kuththaala mazha
enmela vizha
appodhu soodaachu.

eppodhum ena
koththaaga ana
en dhegam yaedaachu.

manja kulikkaiyila
nenju viriyuthunga.
konjam anaichu kollaiyaa

kalyaanam kachcheri
eppodhu, unakku. ..

Poova eduthu oru
maala thoduthu vachcheney
en chinna rasa. (2)

un tholukkaagathaan
indha maala yaengudhu.
kalyaanam kachcheri
eppodhu.

Poova eduthu oru
maala thoduthu vachcheney
en chinna rasa.
